mapper.select: select rc_name, rc_date, hr_name from champion where tr_name=#{tr_name}
mapper.update: update trainers set tr_no = #{value} where tr_name = #{tr_name}
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RACE_RESULT AS RRS WHERE RRS.RR_RCDATE = RS.RCDATE AND RRS.RR_RCNO = RS.RCNO AND RRS.RR_MEET = RS.MEET) AS HRCOUNT FROM( SELECT rr.rr_jkName as jkName,rr.rr_owName as owName,RR.RR_TRNAME AS TRNAME, rr.rr_hrName as hrName,RI.RI_RCDATE AS RCDATE, RI.RI_RCNO AS RCNO, RI.RI_MEET AS MEET, RI.RI_RANK AS RANKS, RI.RI_RCDIST AS RCDIST, RI.RI_RCNAME AS RCNAME,rr.rr_ord as ord FROM RACE_INFO AS RI INNER JOIN RACE_RESULT AS RR ON RI.RI_RCDATE = RR.RR_RCDATE AND RI.RI_RCNO = RR.RR_RCNO AND RI.RI_MEET = RR.RR_MEET WHERE RR.RR_trNO =#{trno}) AS RS
